About Me

Crypto Veteran.  Action Taker.  Optimist.

My name is Ayo but my friends call me "Mr get sh*t done"

Former prolific Marketing Manager with a degree in Finance who decided life is too short to not live your passion. Been hopelessly immersed in Web Development ever since.

Born and raised in London. Moved to Stockholm May 2020. Experience leading teams. Love crypto. Charity co-founder of Stop Holding Back: an international personal development charity helping people who suffer from stuttering increase their career prospects.

faq

I'm an open book.

I’ve been 100% committed to mastering the craft of Web Development for 8 months now.

On average, you’ll find me coding for at least 6 hours a day - every day. ,

As a natural problem solver, I find huge satisfaction in working with something so unpredictable, innovative and forward-moving.

I also love how alive I feel when collaborating in teams, where we’re building something from scratch (or on top of other dev's code), to create solutions that ultimately add value - by making our lives easier and more enjoyable

Since finishing projects according to deadlines is of utmost importance to both myself and you, I make sure to communicate with full transparency to ensure that I understand all the various components to a project.

I believe asking questions for clarification whenever they arise is key for any project to succeed.
